exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure Exposure compensation (-2.0 to +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)

autofocusaffocusareaselection: Auto (9-area automatic selection) Center Face priority Subject tracking
aperture: Electronically controlled ND filter (-2.0 AV) insertion

shutterspeed: 1/2000-1 sec. 1/4000 sec. (maximum speed during high-speed continuous shooting) 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
